name: Kalpana Chawla
quote: The path from dreams to success does exist. May you have the vision to find it, the courage to get on to it, and the perseverance to follow it.
summary: Indian-American astronaut and engineer, the first woman of Indian origin in space, who flew on two Space Shuttle missions.
shortDescription: Kalpana Chawla was an Indian-American astronaut and engineer, the first woman of Indian origin in space. She flew on two Space Shuttle missions and inspired millions with her achievements in aerospace.

detailed_description.early_life: Born in Karnal, India, Kalpana was fascinated by flight from a young age. She earned a degree in aeronautical engineering from Punjab Engineering College before moving to the US for graduate studies.
detailed_description.stem_journey: Kalpana earned her PhD in aerospace engineering and joined NASA, where she became a mission specialist and flew on two Space Shuttle missions.
detailed_description.challenges: As an immigrant woman in aerospace, Kalpana faced cultural and gender barriers. She persevered through determination and passion for flight.
detailed_description.achievements: First woman of Indian origin in space, flew on STS-87 and STS-107, and contributed to research in microgravity.
detailed_description.legacy: Kalpana inspired millions in India and around the world to pursue careers in STEM and space exploration.
